ADD_TRIGGER_SUCCESS: I be singin' a `%WC%` shanty when the Lookout calls `%WC%`!
EMOTE_STATS_TITLE: Yarr! The Coxswain's been keepin' count:
FAMILY_CREATED: The Man-o'-War be ready! Weigh Anchor!
FAMILY_JOIN_CODE: **Arr, yer Join Code for the S.S. %WC% is:**%BR%`%WC%`%BR%_Use it wisely, it only works once!_
FAMILY_JOIN_CODE_INVALIDATED: [The Cap'n tore up the contract! Ye must make a new one to try again.]
FAMILY_REMOVED_SERVER: Made **%WC%** walk the plank from the Brigantine **%WC%**!
FAMILY_SERVER_LIST: The Brigantine "%WC%" has recruited the following hands:
FEEDBACK_COOLDOWN: The Cap'n is fed up with yer yappin'! He be takin' a caulk. Ye best not run a rig.
FEEDBACK_SENT: The Cap'n has received yer request. Ye best wait a few ticks of ye pocketwatch.
FORUM_WEAPON_ADDED_ALIAS: A pirate always be needin' a good alias. That one'll do.
FORUM_WEAPON_CREATED: Arr! We be sailin' with a new gun: **%WC%**
FORUM_WEAPON_DESTROYED: Ye weapon's got a taste of the cat!
FORUM_WEAPON_DUPLICATE: :warning: Arr! Ye breathren o' the coast may 'ave ye blunderbuss already: **%WC%**
FORUM_WEAPON_UPDATED: New grape shots be loaded in the cannon!
INVALID_TRIGGER_TYPE: Ye disgrace! Hasn't the Cap'n said ye can only use %WC%?
ITEM_ADDED: Ye booty be placed in the coffers!
MUSIC_PLAYLIST_CONVERTED: Converted the queue into a new Playlist `%WC%` with `%WC%` tracks!
SENT_PRIVATE_MESSAGE: Arr, be lookin' fer me message in a bottle.
SERVER_FAMILY_LIST: We got the king's shilling for the followin':
SETTING_UPDATED_SUCCESS: The treasure map be marked with a new spot!
TALLY_LIST: Here be what is kept in the ship manifest:

BOT_ERROR: Arr! We be bilged on her anchor!
CANNOT_DELETE: Arr, the Cap'n not be lettin' ye blow the man down.
CHANNEL_NOT_FOUND: Me compass needle be pointin' wrong.
COMMAND_NOT_FOUND: Get ye sea legs, matey! That order hasn't been called yet.
FAMILY_ALREADY_EXISTS: This vessel already be flyin' the Jolly Roger!
FAMILY_ALREADY_JOINED: Blimey! Another flag be usin' that name. Choose another!
FAMILY_NOT_JOINED: Shiver me timbers! They not be flyin' the flag!
FAMILY_MEMBER_MAXIMUM_REACHED: Blimey! Ye vessel be loaded to the gunwales!
FAMILY_MAXIMUM_REACHED: Ye mast has room for 3 flags only!
FAMILY_SERVER_LIST_EMPTY: Arr! There be nobody flyin' under the flag.
FORUM_WEAPON_MAXIMUM_REACHED: Blimey! Ye vessel be loaded to the gunwales!
FORUM_WEAPON_OWNED_OTHER: Arr, that powder keg be on a different lugger.
GUILD_REQUIRED: Arr! That be needin' a proper vessel to use!
HEY_THERE: Aye! Call ye Cap'n with `%WC% help`!
INCOMPLETE: Arr, Lad! Ye be talkin' nonsense. What else ye need to say?
INCORRECT_ITEM_COUNT: Arr, ye pieces don't be addin' up.
MUSIC_NOT_IN_CHANNEL: Please join a voice channel and run this command again.
MUSIC_PLAYLIST_ALREADY_EXISTS: A Playlist with that name already exists on this server!
MUSIC_PLAYLIST_EMPTY: There are no tracks in that Playlist.
MUSIC_PLAYLIST_NAME_MISSING: Please enter a name for the new Playlist.
MUSIC_PLAYLIST_PAGE_EMPTY: There are no tracks in that Playlist on this page.
MUSIC_PLAYLIST_TRACK_MAXIMUM_REACHED: Playlists currently support a max of 50 tracks.
MUSIC_QUEUE_EMPTY: There are no tracks in the Queue.
MUSIC_QUEUE_PAGE_EMPTY: There are no tracks in the Queue on this page.
MUSIC_WRONG_INPUT: Please enter a media URL or playlist name!
NO_PERMISSION_BOT: Arr, they give no quarter to the crew.
NO_PERMISSION_USER: Arr, the Cap'n won't give ye a nipperkin!
RESERVED_WORD: Arr, that word be takin' by the Cap'n himself.
SERVER_FAMILY_LIST_EMPTY: Shiver me timbers! There be no flag we flyin'
SETTING_NOT_FOUND: The compass be pointin' in the wrong direction.
TIME_VALUE_INCORRECT: The amount of time provided is invalid!
WRONG_USAGE: Blasted Swab! That not be how it's done.
